title: Kick-off
description: The referee blows his whistle and we're off in Swansea

title: Goal!
description: A woeful error from Swansea at the back allows Oscar in and he makes no mistake with his finish

title: Goal!
description: Diego Costa doubles Chelsea's lead making the most of a lack of marking on the edge of the box before finishing with an emphatic shot

title: Goal!
description: Another error from Swansea at the back allows Costa in Federico Fernandez tapping the ball to the striker and its a simple finish for him

title: Goal!
description: Oscar scores Chelsea's fourth of the game finding the top corner with a beauty of a shot!

title: Substitution
description: Costa is replaced by Loic Remy

title: Substitution
description: Nathan Dyer is replaced by Modou Barrow

title: Substitution
description: Andre Schurrle comes on for Willian

title: Goal!
description: Schurlle wraps up a fine attacking move from the Blues with a sweeping finish

title: Full-time
description: Swansea did not have a shot on target in the whole game.  They'll be glad of the final whistle.  Chelsea 5 - 0 Swansea
